snippet.title: 2021 Pikmin Direct Trailer (With Pikmin Wars release)
snippet.description:
This trailer was my part of the yearly Pikmin Direct community project.
In here I show a new hack called Pikmin wars that you can download now, as well as some updates for things I have planned for Colossal Caverns in the future. I also show a little bonus something at the end, what could it mean?

Pikmin Wars was made just as a test of how much crazy stuff I can do to the game without considering logic or realism, its a short hack but definitely a fun one to try out.

Download this and all my other projects from here:
https://pikhacker.github.io/

As always make sure to join my discord server if you have questions or want to talk about any of my projects:
https://discord.gg/WHSaSS5
